title: Thai-style peanut stir fry sauce
ingredients: ['130g peanut butter', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons rice vinegar', '1 1/2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon sriracha sauce, or to taste', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '180ml coconut milk']
